resources.string: Nick can control the cycle of day and night with his jetpack. He uses this ability to maintain balance and protect the city from threats that emerge in the dark.
Reality Protector has the ability to see through illusions and lies, ensuring that justice is always served with absolute clarity.
Mimics the light and night to blend in
Andre uses his powers to blend into any environment, making him a master of stealth and infiltration. His agility and strength make him a formidable opponent.
Harnesses the power of canary to develop bravely
Benjamin draws his strength from the spirit of the canary, allowing him to soar through the skies and face dangers with unwavering courage.
Effortlessly glides in to save the day
Maru has the ability to glide through the air with ease, providing swift rescue and assistance in critical situations. Her grace and precision are unmatched.
Ability to shift to any form and energize
Yasmine can transform into any shape, allowing her to adapt to any challenge. Her energy manipulation powers give her an edge in both offense and defense.
